name: How Far We've Come: The Boundless Expanse
name_original: How Far We've Come: The Boundless Expanse
description:
insert stud10 name presents:

v1.0
- fully immersive classic roleplaying universe and writing
- nostalgic pixel sprite art
- spectacularly upbeat theme song made in pxtone
- procedurally tailored character creation
- flexible game length experience
- scissors paper stone simulator
- a disdain for the kind of bullshit marketing jargon you're currently reading
- pets!
- an opening cutscene so laggy it'll have to be addressed for v1.01
- html games are suffering please don't @ us about bad graphic placements they were okay on our screens we swear
